description.value:
Special: Daemon Wep, Flame, Flexible

Note: Weapon: Whip. Daemon WP 68 (Khorne Daemon), Bind Str 4. Att.: Bloodlust, Blood Tracker. Must be Dedicated to Khorne to wield. When drawing must make +0 WP Test or Frenzy can make -10 WP Test to sheath and end Frenzy. Gain Unnatural Senses (Daemon's WP)
